import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import pandas as pd
import time
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

class DoubanMovieSpider:
    def __init__(self):
        self.base_url = 'https://movie.douban.com/top250'
        self.headers = {
            'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36'
        }
        self.movies = []
    
    def get_page(self, start):
        '''è·å–å•é¡µæ•°æ®'''
        url = f'{self.base_url}?start={start}'
        try:
            response = requests.get(url, headers=self.headers)
            response.raise_for_status()
            return response.text
        except Exception as e:
            print(f'è¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥: {e}')
            return None
    
    def parse_page(self, html):
        '''è§£æé¡µé¢æ•°æ®'''
        soup = BeautifulSoup(html, 'html.parser')
        items = soup.find_all('div', class_='item')
        
        for item in items:
            movie = {}
            
            # æ ‡é¢˜
            title = item.find('span', class_='title').text
            movie['title'] = title
            
            # è¯„åˆ†
            rating = item.find('span', class_='rating_num').text
            movie['rating'] = float(rating)
            
            # è¯„ä»·äººæ•°
            people = item.find('div', class_='star').find_all('span')[-1].text
            movie['people'] = people.strip('äººè¯„ä»·')
            
            # ç®€ä»‹
            inq = item.find('span', class_='inq')
            movie['quote'] = inq.text if inq else ''
            
            # è¯¦æƒ…
            info = item.find('div', class_='bd').find('p').text
            parts = info.split('\n')
            movie['info'] = parts[1].strip() if len(parts) > 1 else ''
            
            self.movies.append(movie)
    
    def crawl(self):
        '''å¼€å§‹çˆ¬å–'''
        print('å¼€å§‹çˆ¬å–è±†ç“£ç”µå½±Top250...')
        
        for i in range(0, 250, 25):
            print(f'æ­£åœ¨çˆ¬å–ç¬¬{i//25 + 1}é¡µ...')
            html = self.get_page(i)
            
            if html:
                self.parse_page(html)
                time.sleep(2)  # ç¤¼è²Œå»¶æ—¶
        
        print(f'çˆ¬å–å®Œæˆï¼å…±è·å–{len(self.movies)}éƒ¨ç”µå½±')
    
    def save_to_csv(self, filename='douban_top250.csv'):
        '''ä¿å­˜ä¸ºCSV'''
        df = pd.DataFrame(self.movies)
        df.to_csv(filename, index=False, encoding='utf-8-sig')
        print(f'æ•°æ®å·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°{filename}')
    
    def analyze(self):
        '''æ•°æ®åˆ†æ'''
        df = pd.DataFrame(self.movies)
        
        # åŸºæœ¬ç»Ÿè®¡
        print('\næ•°æ®æ¦‚è§ˆï¼š')
        print(df.describe())
        
        # è¯„åˆ†åˆ†å¸ƒ
        plt.figure(figsize=(12, 5))
        
        plt.subplot(1, 2, 1)
        plt.hist(df['rating'], bins=20, edgecolor='black')
        plt.title('è¯„åˆ†åˆ†å¸ƒ')
        plt.xlabel('è¯„åˆ†')
        plt.ylabel('ç”µå½±æ•°é‡')
        
        # Top10ç”µå½±
        plt.subplot(1, 2, 2)
        top10 = df.nlargest(10, 'rating')
        plt.barh(range(10), top10['rating'])
        plt.yticks(range(10), top10['title'])
        plt.xlabel('è¯„åˆ†')
        plt.title('Top10ç”µå½±')
        plt.gca().invert_yaxis()
        
        plt.tight_layout()
        plt.savefig('douban_analysis.png', dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')
        plt.show()

# ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
spider = DoubanMovieSpider()
spider.crawl()
spider.save_to_csv()
spider.analyze()

print(f"æœ€é«˜åˆ†: {df['rating'].max()}")
print(f"æœ€ä½åˆ†: {df['rating'].min()}")

# è¯„åˆ†æ®µåˆ†å¸ƒ
bins = [8.0, 8.5, 9.0, 9.5, 10.0]
df['rating_group'] = pd.cut(df['rating'], bins=bins)
print(df['rating_group'].value_counts())

plt.figure(figsize=(12, 6))
plt.plot(year_counts.index, year_counts.values, marker='o')
plt.title('å„å¹´ä»½ä¸Šæ¦œç”µå½±æ•°é‡')

plt.ylabel('ç”µå½±æ•°é‡')
plt.xticks(rotation=45)
plt.grid(True, alpha=0.3)
plt.show()

from wordcloud import WordCloud
import jieba

# æå–æ‰€æœ‰ç®€ä»‹
text = ' '.join(df['quote'].dropna())
words = jieba.cut(text)
words_str = ' '.join(words)

# ç”Ÿæˆè¯äº‘
wordcloud = WordCloud(
    font_path='simhei.ttf',  # ä¸­æ–‡å­—ä½“
    width=800,
    height=400,
    background_color='white'
).generate(words_str)

plt.figure(figsize=(12, 6))
plt.imshow(wordcloud, interpolation='bilinear')
plt.axis('off')
plt.title('ç”µå½±ç®€ä»‹è¯äº‘')
plt.show()

def safe_crawl(self):
    '''å¸¦é‡è¯•çš„çˆ¬å–'''
    max_retries = 3
    
    for i in range(0, 250, 25):
        for retry in range(max_retries):
            try:
                html = self.get_page(i)
                if html:
                    self.parse_page(html)
                    break
            except Exception as e:
                if retry == max_retries - 1:
                    print(f'ç¬¬{i}é¡µçˆ¬å–å¤±è´¥')
                else:
                    time.sleep(5)

from tqdm import tqdm

for i in tqdm(range(0, 250, 25), desc='çˆ¬å–è¿›åº¦'):
    html = self.get_page(i)
    if html:
        self.parse_page(html)
        time.sleep(2)
